attributes.comment:
Those of us within the adoption community are very concerned with the proposed
increases in fees. The adoption expenses are so high now, that there are many
many loving families unable to pursue adoption because of it. We are blessed to
live in one of the richest, most developed countries of the world. There are so
many homeless, orphaned children in need of loving homes and all that we can
offer in this great country and as loving families. Please do not make this process
any more difficult than it already is. Thank you for your consideration.
Sincerely, Angela G.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Angela Gibson
